title: MD
biography: Karen Diane Magnussen, OC is a Canadian former competitive figure skater. She is the 1972 Olympic silver medallist and 1973 World champion. She was Canada's Female Athlete of the Year in 1971 and 1972, and was made an Officer of the Order of Canada in 1973.
aiSummary: David Cella is a outcomes research specialist with an H-index of 183 at Northwestern University (Faculty). Has been published in New England Journal of Medicine, JAMA, The Lancet. Based in United States.
